about_the_game:
Demo Details:
Experience the prologue to the 2.5D ARPG game "the Romantic of Righteousness: SanGuo" in this demo in advance.
※This special version of the prologue does not have a save function, and players can choose to repeat the three small levels contained in the prologue in the game interface.
※About language: Due to the needs of the game's plot and the increase in the atmosphere of the ancient game, the beta version adopts the traditional Chinese script commonly used during the Three Kingdoms period as the default language, and the official version may be changed.
※There are some differences between this version and the officially released version.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains cartoon amputated limbs, bloody elements.
